title: BRIEF-SA's Competition Commission Grants Exemption To South African Airways & Air Mauritius JV
text:
BRIEF-SA's Competition Commission Grants Exemption To South African Airways & Air Mauritius JV

Stock Markets 22 minutes ago (Oct 26, 2019 11:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-SA's Competition Commission Grants Exemption To South African Airways & Air Mauritius JV Oct 24 (Reuters) - South Africa's Competition Commission: * GRANT EXEMPTION TO SOUTH AFRICAN AIRWAYS AND (SOC) LTD (SAA) AND AIR MAURITIUS TO FORM JV ON VARIOUS ROUTES * SAA-AIR MAURITIUS JV INCLUDES JOHANNESBURG (JHB) AND MAURITIUS (MRU) ROUTE * EXEMPTION LETS SAA-AIR MAURITIUS JV COLLABORATE ON NETWORK, SCHEDULING, REVENUE MANAGEMENT, DISTRIBUTION FOR BOTH CARRIERS Further company coverage: AIRM.MZ

BRIEF-SA's Competition Commission Grants Exemption To South African Airways & Air Mauritius JV
description: BRIEF-SA's Competition Commission Grants Exemption To South African Airways & Air Mauritius JV
